data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: What are some examples of technology that make your life easier? What other types of technology that we don’t have yet could be potentially be useful to you?
data.answer: Technology plays a great role nowadays. It eases us in all aspects. Without smartphones, computers, cars, washing machines, and so on. It would be a very different world as we all know it today. The fact is all of us rely on technology daily. Whether it is at work, at home, or at school, I know that my family greatly depends on technology, and I am confident that we are not the only ones.  Everybody has a smartphone, so we can communicate easily. I can hardly imagine a time without television and the internet. I dream of a robot that can replace the work of a fridge, dishwasher, and washing machine, it all helps us finish all the chores at home. Technology affects my life in so many ways that it is extremely hard to imagine how much convenience it brings to us. (144 words)
